articles.description: After a weak 2017 predecessor, the band’s new album returns to well-trodden territory. Its peevish lyrics are irritating, but it should avert a slide down festival bills
articles.content: On their 2005 Vertigo tour, U2 came on stage to the strains of Arcade Fires Wake Up. It felt like an act of benediction on the part of stadium rocks undisputed kings, a public equivalent of the fable… [+5024 chars]

articles.title: Steph McGovern and partner forced to make change as daughter's habit 'doing our heads in!' - Express
articles.description: STEPH MCGOVERN has shared how some of her two-year-old daughter's habits were 'doing her and her partner's heads in'.

articles.author: Andrew Levy
articles.title: Will moving Dobby's 'eyesore' grave be a mistake? Public asked if Harry Potter monument should go - Daily Mail
articles.description: The National Trust is launching a survey asking whether a shrine on a Welsh beach for the fictional Dobby the house elf, from Harry Potter, should be removed.
articles.content:
In Harry Potter, he was a beloved companion who was fiercely loyal to his friends.
But will that be enough to protect the grave of Dobby the house elf?

articles.description: ★★☆☆☆David Eldridge has returned to couples’ territory, only with less stimulating results. Back in 2017, the playwright enjoyed critical success with Beginning
